solution_line_template: The total ratio representing the number of children in the family is {boys_ratio_part}+{girls_ratio_part} = <<{boys_ratio_part}+{girls_ratio_part}={total_ratio_parts}>>{total_ratio_parts}

From the total ratio of children in the family, {boys_fraction} represent the number of boys, meaning that the number of boys in the family is {boys_fraction}*{total_children} = <<{boys_fraction}*{total_children}={number_of_boys}>>{number_of_boys}
If the boys are given ${total_money_for_boys} to share, each boy receives ${total_money_for_boys}/{number_of_boys} = $<<{total_money_for_boys}/{number_of_boys}={money_per_boy}>>{money_per_boy}
